items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered reliably even with intermittent connectivity
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio quality remain stable with network fluctuations
Participants can join and leave calls dynamically without disrupting others
non_functional: Support for at least 10 participants in a group call

notes: Assumed the requirement includes both one-to-one and group chat/video calls, and that user authentication is already planned.
